com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils

Class AbstractDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils.AbstractDBHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStorable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoodockDBHelper

    public abstract class AbstractDBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
implements IStorable
    AbstractDBHelper class.

    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase database)
        Create the tables of the database.

        This method is called when the database is being created.

        Specified by:
        onCreate in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        database - the database to be created.
        See Also:
        SQLiteOpenHelper.onCreate(SQLiteDatabase)

      • getCreates

        protected abstract List<String> getCreates()
        Get an ordered list of database creation strings to create the database tables.

        Each string will be passed to SQLiteDatabase.execSQL(java.lang.String).

        Returns:
        an ordered list containing the strings to create the database tables.

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase database,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Upgrade method called during an update of the database, e.g. if increase version.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        database - the database.
        oldVersion - the current version.
        newVersion - the new version.
        See Also:
        SQLiteOpenHelper.onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int)

      • clearAllTables

        public void clearAllTables(SQLiteDatabase database)
        Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).
        Specified by:
        clearAllTables in interface IStorable
        Parameters:
        database - the database to clear.

      • clearAllTables

        public void clearAllTables()
        Clear all the tables of the database (drop and recreate the tables).
        Specified by:
        clearAllTables in interface IStorable

      • getTables

        protected abstract List<String> getTables()
        Get the database table names to be cleared (in inverse order of creation).

        Each string will used to drop the tables if exists passing an SQL statement to SQLiteDatabase.execSQL(java.lang.String) to be executed.

        Returns:
        an ordered list of strings containing the database table names to be cleared.

      • putOpenedDatabase

        public void putOpenedDatabase()
        Put a opened database to be used by converters.
        Specified by:
        putOpenedDatabase in interface IStorable

      • putDatabase

        protected abstract void putDatabase()
        Put a opened database to be shared by the subclass converters.
